page.title: 08EDGE GROVE SCHOOL
page.content: {Edge Grove}is an independent day and boarding Preparatory School for boys. It can be found near {High Cross}in {Square 1498.} The school was founded in 1935, moving to a place in Wales called{Sarnesfield}during World War 2. The main school building can be found on 17th Century maps, and is still surrounded by arable and grazing fields. There is a cricket square, many football pitches, two tennis courts, an outdoor swimming pool, a new gymnasium, chapel and music department. Squash courts and facilities for sixty more boarders will be built in 1986. There is a lake on the school boundary near {Aldenham Village. At present there are 70 boarders and fifty day boys. The school celebrates its {GOLDEN JUBILEE}this year.
